title.en: A Prayer on the Theme of the Great Perfection

text.en: oṃ āḥ hūṃ
In the pure realms of the three kāyas,
text.en-trans: ku sum dakpé zhing kham su

text.en: Blessings and attainments are in perfect abundance.
To the gurus of the victorious ones' mind-direct transmission,
We pray: inspire us with your blessings!
In the supreme places of the great charnel grounds,
You gained supreme and ordinary attainments.
To the gurus of the vidyādharas' sign transmission,
We pray: inspire us with your blessings!
In places of accomplishment, sources of attainment,
Your own and others' welfare is perfectly secured.
text.en-trans: rang zhen dön nyi punsum tsok

text.en: To the gurus of the individuals' whispered transmission,
We pray: inspire us with your blessings!
In the realm of Ghanavyūha, 'Dense Array',
Everything appears as kāyas and wisdoms.
To the infinite yidam deities, peaceful and wrathful,
We pray: inspire us with your blessings!
In sacred places and associated realms,
text.en-trans: né dang nyéwé zhing kham su

text.en: You bring a wish-granting rain of accomplishments.
To the five families of the ḍākinīs of great bliss,
We pray: inspire us with your blessings!
In realms of utterly pure accomplishment,
Your power, strength and miraculous abilities are beyond measure.
To the hosts of ḍākinīs and oath-bound guardians,
We pray: inspire us with your blessings!
To the primordially puredharmadhātu,
text.en-trans: dö né dakpa chö kyi ying

text.en: The vast expanse of changeless awareness,
In which the Akaniṣṭha realm of clear light naturally appears,
text.en-trans: né rang nang ösal omin la

text.en: We pray: inspire us with your blessings!
In our own pure awareness, primordially enlightened,
text.en-trans: rang rig dö né sangyé la

text.en: The kāyas and wisdoms are spontaneously present.
text.en-trans: ku dang yeshe lhun gyi drup

text.en: To this teacher, perfect from the beginning,
We pray: inspire us with your blessings!
To the state in which whatever appears is self-arising wisdom,
Naturally manifest awareness is complete with maṇḍala gatherings,
And all that surrounds us is, and always has been, spontaneously perfect,
text.en-trans: khor kun yé né lhun dzok la

text.en: We pray: inspire us with your blessings!
To this perfect equality, the state of awakening mind,
text.en-trans: nyam dzok chang chub sem kyi ngang

text.en: Spontaneously and primordially present, beyond cause and effect,
Wherein all phenomena are, and always have been, the Great Perfection:
text.en-trans: chö kun yé né dzogchen la

text.en: We pray: inspire us with your blessings!
The pure expanse wherein all is unchanging,
The ground of continuously present eternity —
To this fourth time, forever unfolding,
text.en-trans: dü zhi gyün gyi khorlo la

text.en: We pray: inspire us with your blessings!
Whatever appears manifests as kāyas and wisdoms,
text.en-trans: chir nang ku dang yeshé dang

text.en: Emptiness is heard as the unborn sound of Dharma,
text.en-trans: drak tong kyé mé chö kyi dra

text.en: And thoughts are the primordially awakened wisdom mind.
text.en-trans: dren rig yé né sangyé tuk

text.en: To such a state, we pray: inspire us with blessings!
In this great expanse of naturally manifesting awareness,
Appearance and existence are the pure vessel and its contents,
And saṃsāra is not rejected but emptied from its very depths.
To such a state, we pray: inspire us with blessings!
In the great, sky-like expanse of our own awareness,
text.en-trans: rang rig kha nyam longchen du

text.en: The three kāyas are not to be sought, but are already perfect,
text.en-trans: ku sum ma tsal yé dzokpé

text.en: And nirvāṇa, even without being cultivated, is spontaneously present.
To such a state, we pray: inspire us with blessings!
All dharmas within the expanse of awakening mind
text.en-trans: chö kun changchup sem kyi long

text.en: Are neither purified nor gradually attained, but spontaneously perfect.
text.en-trans: ma jang ma drö lhun gyi drup

text.en: To this state, in which all is buddhahood from the very beginning,
We pray: inspire us with blessings!
To primordially pure awareness, the expanse of dharmakāya,
Which is transparent and nakedly clear, we pray!
A state that is unbounded, uninterrupted and pervasive —
Inspire us to realize the Great Perfection!
Spontaneously present wisdom, the expanse of clear light —
Inspire us to realize the pure manifestations of absolute space!
text.en-trans: ying nang dakpar chin gyi lop

text.en: The expanse of manifestation that is the basis for ceaseless arising —
text.en-trans: char zhi ma gak trulpé long

text.en: Inspire us to realize the purity of dualistic grasping!
text.en-trans: zung dzin dakpar chin gyi lop

text.en: The expanse in which all phenomena are self-arising, pure awareness —
Inspire us to realize the total freedom that is beyond all effort!
text.en-trans: bé mé yongdrol chin gyi lop

text.en: Transcending cause and effect, adoption or avoidance, effort or exertion —
Inspire us to realize the perfect ground of dharmakāya!
text.en-trans: zhi dzok chökur chin gyi lop

text.en: The expanse of awakening in which all is perfect equality —
Inspire us to realize the complete liberation of the three realms!
text.en-trans: kham sum yongdrol chin gyi lop

text.en: To the gurus, yidam deities and ḍākinīs,
For our own and others' sake, we pray:
Inspire us to reach the realization in which all dissolves intodharmatā,
And thereby to perfect the twofold benefit of ourselves and others!
text.en-trans: dön nyi dzokpar chin gyi lop

text.en: The space of primordial purity, wherein ordinary phenomena are exhausted,
text.en-trans: ying ka né dakpa chö zé ngang

text.en: Dharmakāya beyond the conceptual mind, in which all is transparent and clear —
Gurus of the oral lineage: inspire us with your blessings!
Root guru, hold us in your compassion!
The sambhogakāya realm of self-appearing luminosity,
Wherein the buddha-forms and light-spheres shimmer and glow —
text.en-trans: ku dang tiklé mé ré ré

text.en: Gurus of the oral lineage: inspire us with your blessings!
Root guru, hold us in your compassion!
The immaculate, sky-like expanse of space and awareness,
text.en-trans: ying rig kha tar dakpé long

text.en: The clear light in whichprāṇa-mind is utterly pure —
Gurus of the oral lineage: inspire us with your blessings!
Root guru, hold us in your compassion!
So that all may reach the profound expanse ofdharmatā,
Wherein each and every wish is spontaneously fulfilled,
Lamas of the oral lineage: inspire us with your blessings!
Root guru, hold us in your compassion!
